titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 9130 Markville Drive in Dallas, Texas, as the "Vaughn Gross Post Office Building".
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 9130 Markville Drive in Dallas, Texas, as the "Vaughn Gross Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 9130 Markville Drive in Dallas, Texas, as the "Vaughn Gross Post Office Building."
